title: Private, spacious patios and decks*
posting_body: Welcome Home to Montane
Welcome to Montane Apartments, a place where resort-inspired living and boundless comfort blend together to create an unforgettable experience.
Boasting a desirable location and a long list of gorgeous amenities, our apartments in Parker, CO, show you the true meaning of a luxury community.
Come visit us and bring your pets along, Schedule a tour of our Parker apartments today!
Call Now:
show contact info
OR Text
to
show contact info
to text our team directly.
Follow The Link
Below:
<URL>
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1432 Sq.
Ft.
Features
- Modern ceiling fans with integrated light
- Open, peninsula or island kitchen options
- Built-in desks and storage*
- Private, spacious patios and decks*
- Under-mount kitchen and bathroom sinks
- Panoramic views of Mount Evans, Pike's Peak and the Rocky Mountain Front Range
- Full-size, front-load Whirlpool washers and dryers in unit
- Modern lighting and designer plumbing fixtures
- Double sinks and frameless glass showers with subway tiling*
- Euro-style cabinetry with upgraded hardware and open shelving
- Designer kitchens with granite countertops and Whirlpool® stainless steel appliances
- Cable/WiFi access and USB charging stations
- Large walk-in closets with built-in shelving (featured in select homes)
- Rustic hardwood-style plank flooring and Berber-style carpeting
- Custom gear bench at entry*
*In select units
Community Amenities
- 2 miles to the Lightrail station connecting to downtown Denver and Denver International Airport (DIA)
- Community courtyards with gourmet grills and fireside dining
- Across the street from Crown Point commercial district, with Costco, Boondock's Family Fun Center, Lifetime Fitness and Children's Learning Adventure
- 7 miles from Reuter-Hess Reservoir, which the town has planned to build out for fishing, hiking and non-motorized boating
- Community lounge with WiFi, fireplaces and shuffleboard
- 10 minutes driving to the Denver Tech Center, 20 minutes to downtown Denver and 30 minutes to DIA
- Across the street from King Soopers Marketplace, featuring clothing and home goods departments, an expansive prepared foods section and dining area
- 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness center and lounge, featuring a dedicated yoga studio, TRX equipment and WELLBEATS Virtual Fitness
- Entertaining bar with a kegerator and TVs
- Community gardens and greenhouse with raised planting beds
- 1.5-mile, on-site mountain bike and hiking trail that connects to Cherry Creek Trail
- 1.5 miles from Cherry Creek Trail, with direct access to Cherry Creek State Park
- 1 mile away from Parker Adventist Hospital
- Pull-in pet, bike and vehicle wash station
- Resort-style pool, spa and lazy river, with private poolside cabanas, outdoor kitchen and large fire pits
- Outdoor bouldering rock
Pet Policy
Pet friendly, contact for details.
Income Requirements:
3x the rent
Office Hours
Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM
Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM
Montane
18301 East Cottonwood Drive , Parker, CO, 80134
